home.title: App Lock
home.testing_instructions:
ðŸ’¡ Testing Instructions:
1. Lock an app below
2. Go to home screen
3. Open the locked app
4. Lock screen should appear
home.cannot_lock_self: You cannot lock the App Lock application itself.
home.auto_lock_description: Automatically lock newly installed apps for better security.
home.lock_all_confirmation: Are you sure you want to lock all apps?
home.unlock_all_confirmation: Are you sure you want to unlock all apps?
home.initial_setup_message: Default security setup complete. Your AppLock is now protecting your apps.
home.security_recommendation_desc: Lock the App Lock application itself for maximum security. Otherwise, anyone can access and modify your lock settings.
home.security_enabled_message: App Lock is now protected. You will need to enter your PIN to access it.
home.no_search_results: No apps match your search. Try different keywords.
home.no_apps_available: No apps available. Please check if app permissions are granted.

setup.title: Set Up Your Security
setup.subtitle: Create a secure PIN to protect your applications

permissions.title: App Lock
permissions.subtitle: We need some permissions to protect your apps
permissions.accessibility_desc: Required to detect when apps are launched and lock them
permissions.overlay_desc: Required to show the lock screen over other applications
permissions.usage_desc: Required to see which apps are installed and running
permissions.note: Note: After granting permissions, return to this screen to continue.
permissions.accessibility_description: Please enable the accessibility service for App Lock in Settings > Accessibility to lock apps properly.

lock_screen.too_many_attempts: Too many failed attempts. Try again in {{minutes}} minutes

settings.title: Settings
settings.device_app_secure: Your device and app are secure
settings.biometric_desc: Use fingerprint or face to unlock apps
settings.biometrics_not_available: Biometric authentication is not available on this device
settings.overlay_permission_desc: Required for showing lock screen over other apps
settings.premium_description: Remove ads and get extra features
settings.reset_app_data_desc: Clear all locked apps and settings
settings.reset_confirmation: This will clear all your locked apps and settings. This action cannot be undone.
settings.reset_success: App data has been reset successfully
settings.biometric_module_unavailable: Biometric module not available. Please reinstall the app.

change_password.title: Change Master PIN
change_password.subtitle: Update your security PIN to keep your apps protected

security_question.title: Security Question
security_question.subtitle: Set up a security question to recover your PIN if you forget it
security_question.pet_name: What was your first pet's name?
security_question.elementary_school: What was the name of your elementary school?
security_question.mother_maiden: What is your mother's maiden name?
security_question.birth_city: What city were you born in?
security_question.save_success: Security question has been set up successfully
security_question.clear_confirm: Are you sure you want to clear your security question?

forgot_pin.title: Forgot PIN
forgot_pin.subtitle: Answer your security question to reset your PIN
forgot_pin.reset_note: Resetting your PIN will unlock all currently locked apps for security reasons.
forgot_pin.no_question_set: Security question not set up. Please set it up in Settings.
forgot_pin.reset_warning: This will reset your PIN and unlock all apps. You will need to set up a new PIN.
forgot_pin.reset_success: PIN has been reset. All apps are now unlocked.

about.title: App Lock
about.description: Secure your privacy by locking apps with a PIN code. App Lock provides comprehensive protection for your personal applications and data.
about.app_locking_desc: Lock any app with PIN protection
about.biometric_auth_desc: Unlock with fingerprint or face ID
about.footer: Â© 2024 App Lock. All rights reserved.
about.footer_subtext: Protect your privacy, one app at a time.

language.title: Select Language
language.subtitle: Choose your preferred language
language.welcome_subtitle: Choose your preferred language to get started

errors.pin_too_short: PIN must be at least 4 digits
errors.usage_access: Could not open usage access settings
